nodes.text: Finn was a young Human boy who lived on Coruscant during the last years of the Galactic Republic. In 32 BBY his nanny droid suffered a malfunction, leading Finn on a chase around the city. Eventually, Anakin Skywalker and Jar Jar Binks, who were traveling with Naboo monarch Amidala on the capital planet, helped Finn catch and repair the droid and returned him to his mother. Finn's mother helped Skywalker back to the Jedi Temple in thanks for his assistance in locating her son.
